mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dictionary(id, value, description, is_active, deleted_at, category_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{value}, #{description}, true, null, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE dictionary SET is_active = false, deleted_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE dictionary SET is_active = true, deleted_at = null WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, value, description, is_active, deleted_at, category_id FROM dictionary_items WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND is_active = true
